## Description {#details}

Functions in this group correspond to APIs on <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantexpr">llvm::ConstantExpr</a>.

### LLVMConstGEPWithNoWrapFlags() {#gad37bd28ca7a387bf578a40b18011e2a2}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLVMValueRef LLVMConstGEPWithNoWrapFlags (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#gab81b4df33167d47174f9b86a75e3be88">LLVMTypeRef</a> Ty, <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> ConstantVal, <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> &#42; ConstantIndices, unsigned NumIndices, <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmccoretypes/#gaeb6383c04639ca19d2ad3f6ff9958292">LLVMGEPNoWrapFlags</a> NoWrapFlags)</>}>
Creates a constant GetElementPtr expression.

Similar to LLVMConstGEP2, but allows specifying the no-wrap flags.
